name: Donate Crypto Block
author: Gabriel Maldonado

sections.description:
Adds a “Donate Crypto” block integrated via Coinbase Commerce. Accepts Bitcoin, Bitcoin Cash, Dai, Ethereum, Litecoin, and USD Coin.

Installation and Setup

1) Upon activation, a new “Donate Crypto” block will appear in your WordPress editor
2) Login at https://commerce.coinbase.com/
3) Go to https://commerce.coinbase.com > Dashboard > click on “Accept Payments” > Accept Donations and follow the steps on screen
4) Go to https://commerce.coinbase.com > Dashboard > Checkouts and copy the donation payment link
5) Add your payment link into the block

Documentation

  • Documentation: https://tilcode.blog/

1.0.1

  • Added readme.txt

1.0.0

  • Hello World
